snippet: The company said that its first-quarter net income rose 1.8 percent as it charged higher prices for its packaged foods and its sales rose in developing markets.
abstract: Kraft Foods reports first-quarter profit of $813 million, or 46 cents a share, up 1.8 percent from $799 million, or 45 cents a share, in the year-ago quarter; revenue rose 4 percent to $13.1 billion from $12.57 billion.
lead_paragraph: The company said that its first-quarter net income rose 1.8 percent as it charged higher prices for its packaged foods and its sales rose in developing markets.

headline.main: Higher Prices Help Kraft Raise Profit
headline.print_headline: Higher Prices Help Kraft Raise Profit
